Greensboro.Cathedral of His Glory:
The Cathedral of His Glory is the second headquarters of Ministries of His Glory International. It is a Pentecostal church based out of Greensboro, North Carolina, USA. The Ministries of His Glory churches, including the church in North Carolina, follow a cell group organizational structure similar to that of Bethany World Prayer Center in Baton Rouge, Louisiana.


== History ==
The Cathedral of His Glory was started by Paul Willis under the name Christian Word Teaching Ministries in the Terrace movie theater in Greensboro, N.C. The congregation built its 2200-seat sanctuary on a piece of land near the Lake Jeanette off Lake Jeanette Road.
